items.question: How do I reset my password?
items.answer: Tap 'Forgot Password?' on the login screen, enter your email address, and we'll send you a reset link. Check your inbox and follow the instructions to create a new password.

items.question: How do I verify my email?
items.answer: After registration, check your inbox for a verification email. Click the link in the email to verify your account. If you don't see it, check your spam folder or request a new verification email from the verification screen.

items.question: How do I enable Two-Factor Authentication (2FA)?
items.answer: Go to Settings > Security & Privacy > Two-Factor Authentication. Follow the setup wizard to scan the QR code with your authenticator app (Google Authenticator, Authy, or Microsoft Authenticator) and enter the verification code.

items.question: How do I change my language or theme?
items.answer: You can change your language and theme from the Settings screen. Tap on 'Language' to select from English, Spanish, or Hindi. Tap on 'Theme' to choose between System, Light, or Dark mode.

items.question: How do I delete my account?
items.answer: Go to Settings and scroll to the bottom to find 'Delete Account'. This action performs a soft delete - your account will be marked for deletion but can be recovered within 30 days. After 30 days, all your data will be permanently deleted.

items.question: I'm having trouble logging in. What should I do?
items.answer: First, check your internet connection. Ensure you're entering the correct email and password. If you've forgotten your password, use the 'Forgot Password?' link. If you're still having issues, try clearing the app cache or contact our support team.

items.question: How do I enable biometric authentication?
items.answer: Biometric authentication (fingerprint or face recognition) is available if your device supports it. The app will prompt you to enable it during login. You can also enable it later from Settings > Security & Privacy.

items.question: Why is my email verification not working?
items.answer: Make sure you're clicking the correct link from the verification email. The link may expire after 24 hours. If it's expired, request a new verification email from the verification screen. Also check your spam/junk folder.

items.question: How do I update my profile information?
items.answer: Go to Settings > Edit Profile to update your name and profile photo. You can tap on your profile picture to change it by selecting a new photo from your device gallery.

items.question: Is my data secure?
items.answer: Yes! We use Firebase Authentication for secure login, encrypted local storage for sensitive data, and follow industry best practices. Your biometric data never leaves your device. Review our Privacy Policy and Security documentation for more details.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content: We at Whiz IT are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how LoginX collects, uses, stores, and protects your personal information. By using our application, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.

dataCollection.title: 2. Data We Collect
dataCollection.content:
We collect the following types of information:

• Personal Information: Name, email address, and profile photo that you provide during registration.

• Authentication Data: Login credentials managed securely through Firebase Authentication.

• Device Information: Device type, operating system version, and unique device identifiers for push notifications.

• Usage Data: App interactions, features used, and session information to improve our services.

• Biometric Data: Fingerprint or face recognition data (stored locally on your device only, never transmitted to our servers).

• Location Data: General location information if you grant permission (used for security purposes).

We do not collect sensitive personal information such as financial data, health records, or government-issued ID numbers.

dataCollectionMethods.title: 3. How We Collect Data
dataCollectionMethods.content:
We collect data through:

• Account Registration: Information you provide when creating your account.

• Profile Updates: Changes you make to your profile and settings.

• App Usage: Interactions with app features and navigation patterns.

• Firebase Services: Authentication, cloud storage, and analytics through Firebase/Google services.

• Device Sensors: Biometric sensors (with your permission) for authentication.

• Third-Party Integrations: Expo services for push notifications and app updates.

dataUse.title: 4. How We Use Your Data
dataUse.content:
We use your information to:

• Provide and maintain our authentication and user management services.

• Verify your identity and secure your account access.

• Send you push notifications about account activity (with your consent).

• Communicate important updates, security alerts, and service announcements.

• Improve app performance, fix bugs, and develop new features.

• Analyze usage patterns to enhance user experience.

• Comply with legal obligations and enforce our Terms of Service.

• Prevent fraud, abuse, and unauthorized access.

We will never use your data for purposes other than those described in this policy without your explicit consent.

dataStorage.title: 5. Data Storage and Security
dataStorage.content:
Your data is stored securely using:

• Firebase Firestore: Cloud-based database for user profiles and settings (encrypted at rest and in transit).

• Expo SecureStore: Hardware-backed encrypted storage for sensitive data like authentication tokens.

• AsyncStorage: Local storage for app preferences (non-sensitive data only).

Security Measures:
• End-to-end encryption for data transmission
• AES-256 encryption for local sensitive data
• Secure password hashing (never stored in plain text)
• Regular security audits and updates
• Firebase Security Rules to prevent unauthorized access
• Biometric data never leaves your device

For more details, please refer to our SECURITY.md documentation.

dataSharing.title: 6. Data Sharing and Third Parties
dataSharing.content:
We share limited data with trusted third-party service providers:

• Firebase/Google Cloud: Authentication, database, and analytics services. Subject to Google's Privacy Policy.

• Expo Services: Push notification delivery and app update distribution.

• Sentry: Error tracking and performance monitoring (anonymized data only).

We DO NOT:
• Sell your personal information to anyone
• Share your data with advertisers
• Rent or trade your information
• Use your data for marketing purposes without consent

We may disclose your information if required by law, court order, or to protect our legal rights and user safety.

yourRights.title: 7. Your Rights (GDPR/CCPA Compliance)
yourRights.content:
You have the following rights regarding your personal data:

• Right to Access: Request a copy of all personal data we hold about you.

• Right to Rectification: Update or correct inaccurate information through your profile settings.

• Right to Deletion: Delete your account and associated data (soft delete with 30-day recovery period).

• Right to Data Portability: Export your data in a machine-readable format.

• Right to Withdraw Consent: Opt-out of push notifications and marketing communications.

• Right to Object: Object to processing of your data for specific purposes.

• Right to Restrict Processing: Request limitation on how we use your data.

To exercise these rights, contact us at privacy@loginx.app or vivek@whizit.co.in.

cookies.title: 8. Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content:
We use local storage mechanisms but do not use traditional web cookies:

• AsyncStorage: For app preferences and non-sensitive settings
• Session Management: Authentication tokens stored in SecureStore
• Analytics: Anonymous usage statistics to improve the app

You can clear app data through your device settings, which will remove all locally stored information.

childrenPrivacy.title: 9. Children's Privacy
childrenPrivacy.content: LoginX is not intended for children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you are a parent or guardian and believe your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us immediately, and we will delete such information from our systems.

international.title: 10. International Data Transfers
international.content: Your data may be transferred to and stored on servers located outside your country of residence. We use Firebase's global infrastructure, which complies with applicable data protection laws including GDPR and CCPA. Data is encrypted during transfer and storage to ensure security across borders.

updates.title: 11. Policy Updates
updates.content:
We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. We will notify you of any significant changes through:

• In-app notifications
• Email to your registered address
• Notice on our website

The 'Last Updated' date at the top of this policy indicates when it was last revised. Your continued use of the app after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

contact.content:

Email: privacy@loginx.app or vivek@whizit.co.in

createAccount.question: How do I create an account?
createAccount.answer:
To create an account:

1. Tap “Sign Up” on the login screen
2. Enter your email and create a strong password
3. Verify your email address
4. Complete your profile setup

You can then enable biometric login and customize your preferences in Settings.

enableBiometric.question: How do I enable biometric login?
enableBiometric.answer:
Enable Face ID/Touch ID for quick, secure access:

1. Go to Settings → Security
2. Tap “Biometric Authentication”
3. Follow the on-screen instructions

Your biometric data is stored securely on your device only and never leaves it.

resetPassword.question: How do I reset my password?
resetPassword.answer:
If you forgot your password:

1. Tap “Forgot Password” on the login screen
2. Enter your email address
3. Check your email for a password reset link
4. Create a new strong password

Make sure to use a unique password that you don't use elsewhere.

changeEmail.question: How do I change my email?
changeEmail.answer:
To update your email address:

1. Go to Settings → Profile
2. Tap on your current email
3. Enter your new email address
4. Verify the new email

You'll need to verify the new email before the change takes effect.

twoFactor.question: How do I enable two-factor authentication?
twoFactor.answer:
Add an extra layer of security:

1. Go to Settings → Security
2. Tap “Two-Factor Authentication”
3. Choose your preferred method (SMS or Authenticator App)
4. Follow the setup instructions

We highly recommend enabling 2FA to protect your account.

dataSecure.question: Is my data secure?
dataSecure.answer:
Yes! We take security seriously:

• End-to-end encryption for all data
• Biometric authentication support
• Secure cloud synchronization
• No third-party data sharing
• GDPR & CCPA compliant

Your biometric data never leaves your device, and all cloud data is encrypted.

deleteAccount.question: How do I delete my account?
deleteAccount.answer:
To permanently delete your account:

1. Go to Settings → Account
2. Scroll down and tap “Delete Account”
3. Confirm your decision

⚠️ Warning: This action is permanent and cannot be undone. All your data will be permanently deleted.

appCrashing.question: App is not loading or crashing
appCrashing.answer:
Try these steps:

1. Force close the app and reopen it
2. Check your internet connection
3. Clear app cache (Settings → Clear Cache)
4. Update to the latest version
5. Restart your device

If the problem persists, contact support with details about when the crash occurs.

biometricNotWorking.question: Biometric login not working
biometricNotWorking.answer:
Common solutions:

1. Make sure biometrics are enabled in device Settings
2. Re-register your biometric data in device Settings
3. Toggle biometric login off and on in app Settings
4. Update your device's operating system

If it still doesn't work, use password login and contact support.

noNotifications.question: Not receiving notifications
noNotifications.answer:
Check these settings:

1. Enable notifications in device Settings → Notifications → LoginX
2. Make sure “Do Not Disturb” is off
3. Check in-app notification settings
4. Re-enable notification permissions in the app

{platformNote}

syncIssues.question: Sync issues across devices
syncIssues.answer:
To fix sync problems:

1. Make sure you're signed in with the same account
2. Check your internet connection
3. Pull down to refresh on the main screen
4. Sign out and sign back in

Changes typically sync within a few seconds when connected to the internet.

emailVerification.question: Email verification not received
emailVerification.answer:
Can't find the verification email?

1. Check your spam/junk folder
2. Make sure the email address is correct
3. Tap “Resend Verification Email”
4. Wait a few minutes and check again
5. Add our email domain to your safe senders

If you still don't receive it, contact support.

changeTheme.question: How do I change the theme?
changeTheme.answer:
Customize your app appearance:

1. Go to Settings → Appearance
2. Choose from Light, Dark, or System theme

System theme will automatically match your device's theme settings.

changeLanguage.question: How do I change the language?
changeLanguage.answer:
Switch to your preferred language:

1. Go to Settings → Language
2. Select from available languages
3. The app will update instantly

Currently supported: English, Spanish, Hindi

offlineData.question: What data is stored offline?
offlineData.answer:
The app works offline with these features:

• Your profile information
• Security settings
• App preferences (theme, language)
• Recent activity

Changes made offline will sync automatically when you reconnect to the internet.

clearCache.question: How do I clear app cache?
clearCache.answer:
To clear cached data:

1. Go to Settings → Storage
2. Tap “Clear Cache”
3. Confirm the action

This clears temporary files but keeps your account data safe. You'll remain signed in.

dataUsage.question: How is my data used?
dataUsage.answer:
We respect your privacy:

• Your data is used only to provide our services
• We never sell your data to third parties
• No advertising or tracking
• You can export or delete your data anytime

Read our full Privacy Policy for details.

exportData.question: Can I export my data?
exportData.answer:
Yes! You own your data:

1. Go to Settings → Privacy
2. Tap “Export My Data”
3. Choose export format (JSON or CSV)
4. Download or email the export

This includes all your profile information and activity history.

termsOfService.question: Terms of Service
termsOfService.answer:
By using this app, you agree to:

• Use the app responsibly
• Keep your account secure
• Not violate others' rights
• Comply with applicable laws

View the complete Terms of Service in Settings → Legal.

needMoreHelp.title: Need More Help?
needMoreHelp.description: Our support team is here to assist you with any questions or issues. Contact us anytime!

stillNeedHelp.title: Still Need Help?
stillNeedHelp.description: Our support team is here to assist you with any questions or issues.

platformNotes.ios: On iOS, you may need to allow notifications when first prompted.
platformNotes.android: On Android, check that battery optimization is not blocking notifications.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Your privacy is important to us
privacy.introduction: At LoginX, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your data when you use our application.

accountInfo.title: Account Information
accountInfo.content:
When you create an account, we collect:

• Email address
• Display name
• Password (encrypted and securely stored)
• Profile photo (optional)

This information is necessary to provide you with our services and maintain your account security.

usageData.title: Usage Data
usageData.content:
We collect information about how you use the app:

• Login times and frequency
• Features you use
• Settings and preferences
• Error logs and crash reports

This data helps us improve the app and provide better user experience.

deviceInfo.title: Device Information
deviceInfo.content:
We collect basic device information:

• Device model and operating system
• App version
• Language preference
• Time zone

We do NOT collect your device ID, advertising ID, or other unique identifiers for tracking purposes.

provideServices.title: To Provide and Maintain Services
provideServices.content:
We use your information to:

• Create and manage your account
• Enable authentication and authorization
• Sync your data across devices
• Provide customer support
• Send important service notifications

Your data is used solely to deliver the functionality you expect from LoginX.

improveSecurity.title: To Improve Security and Prevent Fraud
improveSecurity.content:
We monitor for suspicious activity to:

• Detect and prevent unauthorized access
• Identify potential security threats
• Protect against fraud and abuse
• Maintain platform integrity

Your security is our top priority, and we employ industry-standard security measures.

communicate.title: To Communicate With You
communicate.content:
We may contact you to:

• Send account verification emails
• Notify you of important changes
• Respond to your support requests
• Share important security updates

You can control notification preferences in Settings. We will never send you promotional or marketing emails without your explicit consent.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.description:
We implement robust security measures to protect your data:

• End-to-end encryption for all sensitive data
• Secure password hashing with industry-standard algorithms
• Biometric data stored locally on your device only
• Regular security audits and updates
• Secure cloud infrastructure with encrypted storage
• HTTPS/TLS for all data transmission

While we strive to protect your information, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure. We continuously work to enhance our security practices.

noSelling.title: We Never Sell Your Data
noSelling.content: LoginX will NEVER sell, rent, or trade your personal information to third parties for marketing purposes. Your data is yours, and we respect that.

serviceProviders.title: Service Providers
serviceProviders.content:
We may share limited data with trusted service providers who help us operate our services:

• Cloud hosting providers (encrypted storage)
• Authentication services (Firebase)
• Analytics services (anonymized data only)

These providers are bound by strict confidentiality agreements and can only use your data to provide services to us.

legalRequirements.title: Legal Requirements
legalRequirements.content:
We may disclose your information if required by law or in response to:

• Valid legal processes (subpoenas, court orders)
• Requests from law enforcement or government agencies
• Protection of our rights and safety
• Prevention of fraud or illegal activity

We will notify you of such requests unless prohibited by law.

accessData.title: Right to Access
accessData.content: You have the right to access all personal data we hold about you. You can view your account information at any time in the Profile section of the app.

correctData.title: Right to Correction
correctData.content: You can update or correct your personal information at any time through the app settings. If you need assistance, contact our support team.

deleteData.title: Right to Deletion
deleteData.content:
You have the right to delete your account and all associated data:

1. Go to Settings → Account
2. Tap “Delete Account”
3. Confirm your decision

Once deleted, all your data will be permanently removed from our servers within 30 days. This action cannot be undone.

exportData.title: Right to Data Portability
exportData.content:
You can export all your data at any time:

1. Go to Settings → Privacy
2. Tap “Export My Data”
3. Choose your preferred format (JSON or CSV)
4. Download or email the export

You own your data, and we make it easy to take it with you.

childrenPrivacy.title: Children's Privacy
childrenPrivacy.content: LoginX is not intended for children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you believe we have inadvertently collected data from a child, please contact us immediately, and we will delete it.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or legal requirements. When we make significant changes, we will notify you through the app or via email. Your continued use of LoginX after such changes constitutes your acceptance of the updated policy.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Privacy Policy or your personal data, please contact us through the Support section in the app.
